welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pomona, where you'll find a charming blend of historic architecture, vibrant arts scene, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in everything it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Tropical Mexico

restaurants.address: 1371 S East End Ave, Pomona, CA 91766
